name: The Giantess Pass
description:
In The Giantess Pass you play as Odysseus, a famous traveler known for numerous adventures. Odysseus is on the last straight run to home, but he the only way to reach it is through The Giantess Pass. In order for her to let you pass, you need to entertain her.

The game is based on cards against humanity. You get a prompt on the top that you need to answer with one of the five punchlines in the middle. Each supposedly funny answer will please the giantess. If you entertain her enough, she might let you pass. But if you don't..

The game has been made as a part of the MiniJam 75 in 3 days.

Creators

Jiavy - Art

Czaruk - Technicals

Hope you enjoy!
